trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen starter også andre spesialiserte hendelser når enkelte knapper er klikket (knapper med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete", "Oppdatering" og "Side", for eksempel).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en av disse knappene, bør du vurdere å behandling av en av spesialiserte hendelsene fra kontrollen (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewCommandEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen klikket.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the button control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå knappekontrollen hendelsen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewCommandEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified source of the command and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte kilden til argumenter for kommandoen og arrangementer.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Objektet i den `commandSource` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified row, source of the command, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte raden kilden for kommandoen, og hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Objektet i den `commandSource` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row containing the button.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer raden som inneholder knappen.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Henter kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CommandSource-egenskapen for å få tilgang til egenskapene for objektet som representerer kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: In the case of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object, the source of the command is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that contains the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>objektet, kilden for kommandoen er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen som inneholder knappen klikkes av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> klasse som representerer kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen har behandlet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` i hendelsesbehandlingen til å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen kan ikke behandle hendelsen fordi du arbeider i koden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis databundet hendelseskode ble hoppet over eller er avsluttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
